titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of November 16, 2016, as "American Special Hockey Day".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of November 16, 2016, as "American Special Hockey Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of November 16, 2016, as American Special Hockey Day.
Encourages more individuals to volunteer and help create similarly innovative and beneficial programs for individuals with disabilities.
